issue.title: google.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=%E5%8F%B2%E8%AB%BE%E7%99%BB+ithome&newwindow=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%25E5%258F%25B2%25E8%25AB%25BE%25E7%2599%25BB%2Bithome%26newwindow%3D1) ### Comment > AdGuard is unable to correctly handle Percent-Encoding (e.g., `%=` = `%25`, `&` = `%26`) under certain circumstances. > This issue arises when processing specific URLs or URLs that contain Chinese characters. > > For example, try searching for **"伺服器 ithome"** on `www.google.com`. > When opening the ithome website from the search results, the address cannot be entered properly. > > **Example URL:** > - [https://www.google.com/search?q=伺服器+ithome&newwindow=1](https://www.google.com/search?q=伺服器+ithome&newwindow=1) > - [https://www.google.com/search?q=%E4%BC%BA%E6%9C%8D%E5%99%A8+ithome&newwindow=1](https://www.google.com/search?q=%E4%BC%BA%E6%9C%8D%E5%99%A8+ithome&newwindow=1) > > By disabling protection for `www.google.com` via the **AdGuard browser extension** on **MS Edge**, the issue can be quickly resolved. > However, since I am using **AdGuard for Windows**, the problem may be related to features such as traffic filtering or HTTPS filtering. > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hon44mfz2f40gg0k884cgk0s0oc8woonsk3ndozrgg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/5jf9uwkg3g0s0cgs8k8488cog48osg0cs47brtsmfk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.3 (4994) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0 Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking,

EasyList Italy Custom filters: | User rules (url: none) Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | n/a Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.7.17.18.19.21.22.109.118.122.207.224.250&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.3+%284994%29&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F137.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36+Edg%2F137.0.0.0&win.wfp=true)
